name: Hot & Cool
description:
This game is the submission for Level Up Circle:Beginner's Game jam hosted by tantedante, VincentFoulon80, Griny, Jack Mordred, JollyJoe...!!

Its just a basic game i tried to follow the theme so thats my piece of this game jam and its my first game jam game so yeah its pretty bad butttt....Well, I tried!!

Also its made on buildbox free verson!!!!

Thanks!
